delete_points.desc: delete multiple points from multiple entries

get_all_meta.desc: Get all meta information from all entries

list_points.desc: list all points in an entry

load_point.desc: load all info about a given point and subpoint

multi_stat_analysis.desc: stat analysis with multiple points at the same time

replay.desc: replay experiment == the same as reproduce

rerun.desc: rerun experiment == the same as reproduce

sort_table.desc: sort table, substitute index with loop

stat_analysis.desc: Process multiple experimental results and apply various stat analysis

substitute_x_with_loop.desc: substitute x axis in table with loop
